comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
Other Bain/LOC photos of Gen. Sickles' funeral in New York City, May 8, 1914:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/5415570893/]
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/5517542750/]
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/5416183098/in/photostream/]
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/5209399254/in/photostream/]

The one-legged General Dan Sickles last appeared in this photostream on the Fourth of July, 1913, in attendance at the Golden Anniversary commemoration of the Battle of Gettysburg. He was 90 years old:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/3681834943/]

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Story of the New York City funeral service at St. Patrick's Cathedral, from the New York Times, May 9, 1914: query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=9807E0D71E39E6...
